DOC.brief_summary: Malnutrition see frequently hemodialysis unit develop country . Malnutrition increase morbidity mortality population treatment improve patient survival health status The purpose study compare two strategy improve nutritional status hemodialysis patient : renal-specific oral supplement ( 237 ml ) versus egg albumin-based protein supplement ( 30 g ) daily basis . This trial use Malnutrition Inflammation Score ( MIS ) Subjective Global Assessment ( SGA ) addition use biochemical marker determine nutritional status .
DOC.brief_title: Egg Albumin-Based Protein Supplement Versus Renal-specific Supplement Hemodialysis Patients
DOC.criteria: Chronic Kidney Disease Hemodialysis Infection Liver insufficiency Cancer neoplasia Acquired immunodeficiency syndrome Intestinal malabsorption syndrome
